content: main street headband a no-purl beginner headband pattern by kelly meneely ___________________________________________________________________________ pattern info forget washcloths or scarves if you re learning to knit you can make this adorable giftable headband with just one ball of yarn one set of needles and 5 skills casting on the knit stitch slipped stitches binding off and a little bit ofcreativesewing this beginner-friendly pattern was inspired by one of the local farm yarns close to our shop and it works up just beautifully there are notes included for making different sizes and widths and you can work that 50-100g skein you ve been saving into a gorgeous statement piece for yourself or work up a bunch as gifts for friends teachers busdrivers ordonations materials yarn until your piece measures about 19 or about 2 shorter than your head circumference unstretched note the headband should stretch around your head and overlap a little to account for seaming bind off knitwise leaving a long tail of about 24 for sewing finishing lay the finished rectangle on a table lengthwise fold each shorter end in half and interleave the folds so there are four layers of fabric as shown at the right make sure the headband isn t twisted use the long tail to sew across the ends through all four layers of fabric weave in the co and bobble ends and flip the headband so the seam
